resources.string:
landslide description option 1 1. The Project implements mobile computing features such as: At most 2 of the following:
a. Monitor the usage of battery consumption per app.
b. Plot the location on google Maps and calculate start location and destination.
c. Integrate sensor networks (for example gestures)
Note. Make sure the UI integrates what the discussion that we have in this course.
Must consider the low power computing techniques and security.
Submit a progress from your project.
Documentation with compiled codes and sample output. Score will defend on your progress.
